name: Candy Shoot Mania
description:
Help the girl to find the treasure. For that, you will need to clear the different levels using the cannon. Shoot and hit groups of three or more equal candies. Try to find the best way to complete each level, collect all 3 stars. Earn gold coins to buy amazing power-ups, make upgrades and many more in this addictive match 3 candy shooter game!
Features:

- Real physics makes the game easy and fun to play
- Many levels with various mechanics will keep you always interested
- Top-quality graphics that will highly impress you.
